sentence: The Tribune's Rick Pearson reports that the recent censure of Reps. Adam Kinzinger (R-IL) and Liz Cheney (R-WY) have placed a cloud over campaigning as the aspiring candidates try to tip-toe around the controversy that is roiling the party.
author: Tom Boggioni
title: 'They're all petrified': GOP candidates panicked Trump will blow up their election chances
